issue.description: NM_029975.1 aligns to both reference chr. 10 (acc1/acc2) and to the unplaced contig NT_166447.1. It is not clear whether either genomic sequence correctly represents this gene.
issue.resolution_text: NT_166447.1 is redundant under finished component AC147512, NM_029975.1 aligns to AC147512 with 100% identity. AC147512 has been added to the TPF, an overlap exists to AC099593

issue.description: There are sequence discrepancies between RefSeq NM_198860.1 (GeneID:192734) and the reference genome sequence to which it aligns.
issue.resolution_text: Switchpoint changed so that AC087540 is represented in the reference. There are no sequence discrepancies between RefSeq NM_198860 and AC087540.

issue.description: Raet1c (GeneID:19370) is missing from mouse Build 37
issue.resolution_text: PMID:20166740 indicates Raet1c is absent in the Black 6 genome. This issue will be reopened if sequence from other strains representing this gene become available.

issue.description: There is a gap in the assembly between the centromere and component AC099593.6
issue.resolution_text: Finished component AC147512 has been added to the TPF extending off AC099593 towards the centromere.

issue.description: Gap present between components AC168222.2 and AC156391.6. The gap contains the following unfinished clone and WGS components: AC131283.6, CAAA01052029.1, CAAA01193623.1, CAAA01052025.1and CAAA01224627.1.
issue.resolution_text: Optical map analysis shows the 4.4Mb contig comprising AC147512.15 thru AC168222.2 should be orientated such that AC168222.2 sits adjacent to the centromere and AC147512.15 is paired across the gap with AC156391.6. HTGS_PHASE2 clone AC131283.6 has been added to the TPF extending off AC168222.2.

issue.description: Gap present between components AC147721.6 and AC188091.1
issue.resolution_text: Clone WI1-2703E19 has been finished and accession FQ976856.5 has been added to the TPF closing the gap between components AC147721.6 and AC188091.1

issue.summary: A gap exists between component AC147512.15 and the centromere.
issue.description: A gap exists between component AC147512.15 and the centromere.
issue.resolution_text: Optical map analysis shows the 4.4Mb contig comprising AC147512.15 thru AC168222.2 should be orientated such that AC168222.2 sits adjacent to the centromere and AC147512.15 is paired across the gap with AC156391.6.

issue.description: There is a sequence discrepancy between RefSeq NM_001079824.1 (Hnrnph3) and the genomic sequence to which it aligns resulting in a non-consensus splice site.
issue.resolution_text: PCR performed and an error found in the reference component AC113107. The PCR has been submitted to EMBL/GenBank accession FQ976555.1, this has been added to the TPF to correct the reference.

issue.description: There is a sequence discrepancy between RefSeq NM_018797.2 (Plxnc1) and the genomic sequence to which it aligns resulting in a non-consensus splice site.
issue.resolution_text: AGP switchpoints changed to represent AC159379.14 in the reference, correcting the error in AC159542.8 affecting the splice site. MGSC WGS contig CAAA01029148.1 supports the consesus splice site.

issue.description: There is a sequence discrepancy between RefSeq NM_008826.4 (Pfkl) and the genomic sequence to which it aligns resulting in a non-consensus splice site.
issue.resolution_text: AGP switchpoints changed to represent AC153507.11 in the reference, correcting the error in AC158612.7 affecting the splice site. Finished component AC007433.16 supports the consensus splice site.

issue.summary: SNP analysis of the Mouse Genomes Project suggests a possible single nucleotide error in reference clone AC055777.12
issue.status_text: The reference has been verified, but the existence of contradictory C57BL/6J sequences may be evidence for unrecognized intra-strain variation. This issue will be re-visited when an SOP for investigation of mouse variation is developed.
issue.description: SNP analysis of the Mouse Genomes Project suggests a possible single nucleotide error in reference clone AC055777.12
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.description: Possible redundant clone in chr.10 TPF
issue.resolution_text: AC123806 has been removed from the TPF as redundant under AC192091/AC141428.

issue.description: AC091681.44 removed from TPF since MGSCv37. AC122734.6 and AL691505.12 overlap well.
issue.resolution_text: AC091681.44 removed from TPF since MGSCv37. AC122734.6 and AL691505.12 overlap well.

issue.description: Changes have been made between AC148335.4 and AC122909.2 since MGSCv37

issue.resolution_text: AC226737.3 added to TPF since MGSCv37, overlapping AC152945.1 and providing telomeric sequence.

issue.summary: Fix patch for issue described in MG-4138
issue.description: There is a gap between AC147512.15 and AC156391.6, this patch adds component FO907139.2 to the reference assembly providing ~6kb sequence to the gap.
issue.resolution_text: There is an assembly gap between AC147512.15 and AC156391.6, originally described in MG-4138. This duplicate Jira issue is being used to manage an update at this gap that is being considered for patch release.

issue.summary: Fix patch for issue described in MG-3530
issue.description: There is a gap between AC155712.8 and AC153379.1, this patch adds component FO907138.2 to the reference assembly providing ~16kb sequence to the gap.
issue.resolution_text: There is an assembly gap between AC155712.8 and AC153379.1, originally described in MG-3530. This duplicate Jira issue is being used to manage an update at this gap that is being considered for patch release.

issue.summary: Fix patch for issue described in MG-4141
issue.description: There is a gap between AC168055.3 and AC170751.2, this patch adds component FQ976852.4 to the reference assembly providing ~24.5kb sequence to the gap.
issue.resolution_text: There is an assembly gap between AC168055.3 and AC170751.2, originally described in MG-4141. This duplicate Jira issue is being used to manage an update at this gap that is being considered for patch release.

issue.description: Raet1a (GeneID: 19368) is missing from mouse Build 37.
issue.resolution_text: PMID:20166740 indicates Raet1a is absent in the Black 6 genome. This issue will be reopened if sequence from other strains representing this gene become available.
